name: Combat Practice I
description:
This is a prototype of a fighting game I made in Unity for a class assignment. I tried to analyse and replicate some basic mechanics of fighting games including running, jumping, attacking and more. Hope you enjoy it! Feedback comments are appreciated. 

Controls: 

You have to play with an XBOX controller

X - Quick Attack   A - Jump   B - Special Attack Y - Strong Attack 

Right Joystick - Move 

LT + Move - Run

Team: 

Manuel Fernandez Veiga -> Main character 3D Artist and Animations.

Alfonso López Viejo -> Programmer and 3D artist of the dummy character.
